website_summaries.verdict: An extremely affordable scooter cover, but not ideal for protecting from severe weather.
pros: Lightweight and easy to take on and off
Included buckle helps secure the cover in windy weather
cons: Not very durable in severe weather
Not ideal for scooters that are always outside

customer_reviews.title: *Buy this *
customer_reviews.text: I have two scooters (an 80cc honda elite (with milk crate on back) and a 125 cc Chinese one thats bigger) .. these two covers each came in a bag (NOT smelling like chemicals!) And fit absolutely perfect on BOTH scooters! I am very very happy with them and especially like that they have clips on BOTH ends and cover every single part of the scooter - don't waste your time looking any further (I did it for you!) And ps- I did NOT receive this at a "discount or complimentary " like most people that leave a review (wish I knew how and I probably would!) Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Martino

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good cover, especially for the price. Waterproof, elastic ends, and a clip strap for one end. This thing works for my CBR and my Versys. It doesn't completely cover my Versys due to the high windshield, but it completely covers to the ground, my CBR. I bought one for my CBR then a second for my Versys after I saw how great they were. I've never had one blow off either bike, even in high winds.
customer_reviews.author: k.chambers

customer_reviews.title: Mine's outside, it lasts one year
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's cheap enough to buy one once per year. It lasts that long. I may have to tape (inside) some tears during the last 2 months or so. It is outside all year in the hot CA sun so it does fade (the black) and it does thin out, hence the tears and rips later in life. It fits my 150cc scooter perfectly even with a cargo box on it. I'd rather buy these once a year than pay $30-100 for more expensive ones that will eventually die too.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Haney

customer_reviews.title: This is a good cover. It is easy to put on and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cover. It is easy to put on and take off and keeps the bike dry and clean. I keep the bike in a garage anyway but this cover protects it from dust and anything accidentally getting on the bike. One should take care of their toys after all. The price was very reasonable for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: OldGuy

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I expected, and thick enough, not flimsy, wont rip. Looks great on bike and added red just makes it look more cool and clean. Very happy with it. Keeps rain and dist off and hides it from would be thieves, or maybe slows them down.
customer_reviews.author: Julie S

customer_reviews.title: Great bike cover!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2017 Indian Scout perfectly! I'm not sure how water proof it would actually be (I doubt it would be at all), but that doesn't matter, since I'm only using this cover for the garage (I would never leave my bike parked outside anyways) so that my cats stop climbing all over my bike! It fits great and it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jeep Wrangler TJ Forum

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This was an inexpensive option and the quality shows. I received this in March and it's the beginning of June and time for a new cover. The Arizona sun hasn't been particularly harsh this season but the cover has faded significantly in color and with the few rain showers that have come through the water resistance was shown to be inadequate with the saddle bags filling and seat being soaked. The fabric is noticeably becoming brittle to the point that it's tearing when I remove it to go for a ride. Was hoping for a cover to last until next summer but this one is destined for the trash instead.
customer_reviews.author: ethan

customer_reviews.title: Its not as cheaply made as a lot of the reviews I saw.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a nice cover for the price. It fit my yamaha vino nice it has front and back clips for the wheels and the front had a big rings for any size lock to go thru, which I wasn't expecting also comes in a travel bag. It just started raining hard with high winds 40 mph gust and held on real nice, its going to rain till tomorrow so i don't know yet if its a 100% water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H Oram-Davis

customer_reviews.title: Durable for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I like that there are "stay" clips in front and back of cover.. keeps the cover on during windy days. I have a Honda PCX 150 and this XL 96" is a good fit..roll it up and just store under the seat. More durable than other light weight covers i've had. Can't go wrong for the priced
customer_reviews.author: T. Yui Gassner

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: This is an outdoor cover. I've used it everyday since I got it. I've had it for a few months and it is not withstanding three weather. Not the sun not the rain. It's color is fading and a huge hole ripped in it the other day while I was putting it over the mirror of my scooter. It fits perfect but isn't very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: For such a low price I was expecting lower quality but this is actually very well made and the material feels really durable. I'm very happy with this cover for my motorcycle. They're so expensive everywhere else so I'm really glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Perez

customer_reviews.title: Double check measurements and size  before ordering if you have a tour pack .
customer_reviews.text: Good product with solid stitching on seams . Only down side is sizing! I ordered the biggest one they said would fit a touring bike but it only covers top 2/3 of the Roadking with tour pack on .
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, poor fit.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality material but it does NOT fully fit a 2008 Yamaha Road Star Silverado 1700 with saddle bags, highway bars, passenger seat with backrest, and a full windshield. Fits like a half cover on my bike.
customer_reviews.author: CJG

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Like that it’s lightweight and easy to work with. This is a replacement of one just like it that lasted 3 years. The straps/buckles only lasted about 6-7 months. I had to add some grommets and bungee cords to continue using. The straps on new one appear to be sewn better so I’m hopeful. The material held up for a couple of years but started to tear in areas where it got the most sun. Duct tape worked fine for repair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Motorcycle covers
customer_reviews.text: These look fantastic, we are trying to sell our house and our neighbor has three motorcycles that they threw blue tarps over. We bought three of these and gave them to them so that they don't look quite so redneck. Don't know how long they'll last but they look good now.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Banks

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year in Southern CA sun
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent cover for the price but would only use as a dust cover in the shade. Lasted less than 10 months before it degraded. It became torn and faded. I'm now searching for something that will last and be weather proof.
customer_reviews.author: LLS

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up to outdoor weather
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, good fitting cover for my Vespa. However, the "waterproof / Sun / UV / Dustproof" claims are overstated. Within a few months it was very faded and was ripped / worn out in numerous areas, even though it was stored in a highly shaded area. I've been needing to order a new or different one for a few months now. Likely won't order the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Fits awesome and great cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: It said it wouldn't fit my Bike but It did and I love how easy it is to place and the workmanship is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Da Garzster

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for the money. There are better covers out there for sure but this will Last you a few years if needed. Withstood some heavy storms we've had in our neck of the woods. Durability is great, my only problem is that it isn't completely waterproof and I've had plenty of moisture still on the bike itself after rains.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Keep inside, not for outside use.
customer_reviews.text: Faded after one summer, very light weight and only one strap to secure it to the bike, which failed in a 20 mph wind. No longer waterproof. Suitable as a dust cover when storing the bike inside during the winter. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A Larson

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Fit nicely over motor scooter. Loved the 2 tie down striped which were elastic that eased the locking. However the cover lasted only 1 season before sun and weather destroyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Levine

customer_reviews.title: Not a full Weather cover
customer_reviews.text: Great if you are going to use this indoors. I live Hawaii and this shredded itself from exposure in less 6 months. Wind, Rain and sun are not it's friend. Now park the scooter in a more protected area and the second cover it is doing a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Good product for price. Last 1 I purchased lasted about 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: so yea this cover is NOT water proof like the description said
customer_reviews.text: so yea this cover is NOT water proof like the description said. It doesnt even stop the dew at night from getting on the bike. NOT HAPPY WITH THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big size good enough for big Bikes
customer_reviews.text: It's big good but you have to keep it Tight otherwise if it's windy 😳 you won't see it
customer_reviews.author: Alaa Alrammahi

customer_reviews.title: Good value for summer cover.
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight easy to put on and take off. Well made nice they added buckles to keep it from blowing off. Maybe with added cover ok for winter but mostly is summer cover.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisA

customer_reviews.title: Good basic indoor dust cover
customer_reviews.text: Great dust cover for the bike while parked in the garage, certainly not the most durable cover available but for indoors it will suffice to keep dust and garage contaminants off the Harley.
customer_reviews.author: trooper

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing I guess ....
customer_reviews.text: I carefully read the reviews to see if it would fit my 2011 Honda Silverwing 600 scooter and it does not but just barely - there is no way I can use the fasteners.
customer_reviews.author: Justa Thought

customer_reviews.title: Not good its so BAD!!..
customer_reviews.text: Its not a water proof!!........here in Seattle always raining and my motorcycle keeping wet for this cover keeping have a leaking inside,wasting money and time,i wont recommend this....
customer_reviews.author: George  Valeroso

customer_reviews.title: Oversized sandwich bag
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof toilet paper. It’s about as thick as one of those emergency space blankets. Not expecting it to hold up to the sun’s UV rays for more than a month. Get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for indoor dust cover. The price is justified for this type of use. (Lance Cabo 200i scooter)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover. Protects the bike and hot engine does not melt cover.
customer_reviews.author: JTaylor78

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and looks snazzy
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly and the wind hasn't been able to blow it off yet. Hasn't rained as of yet but I now this material will resist it and it covers my.qhole.mopes without being annoying to put on.
customer_reviews.author: sam fraley

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Excellent Quality and very good. Will buy again when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: David Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Yes yess
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome and has straps so wind doesn't take it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Cover
customer_reviews.text: I like it. But smudges are visible on the red color. Better red color on the top of the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Romaria

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Has two straps to hold it to the bike better then others I've seen covers my bike great
customer_reviews.author: marc  Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Too light for outdoor use....
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last more than a month in the Florida sun.... Not thick enough for outdoor storage. Might be okay for indoor dust cover.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Tallman

customer_reviews.title: Fits the old Honda CB350 perfectly, looks great too.
customer_reviews.text: Fits the old Honda CB350 perfectly, with the mirrors and a luggage rack still attached . One dollar more than the all-black one for a snazzy look. Love it. Garage kept but it seems durable enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Riot

customer_reviews.title: Way bigger than expected and that's not a good thing. Acts like a parachute and allowed my ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for the money. Way bigger than expected and that's not a good thing. Acts like a parachute and allowed my bike to get blown over and fall on the ground while parked. The clips to fasten the cover to the wheels had come off after 2 weeks. Poor stitching there.
customer_reviews.author: Sharif

customer_reviews.title: Great deal cover
customer_reviews.text: Well built cover that fits great and reasonably priced...I couldn't go wrong with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: LRA

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This cover does exactly what you would expect it to and for the price it is a great value. I use it to cover my scooter.
customer_reviews.author: JB bookbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great business
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2020 Gator 49cc scooter, it fits great, arrived on time, I got a scare while opening it, I thought I cut it but it was packaged with care and it’s fine it hugs my tires nicely, I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Trina💕

customer_reviews.title: Priced right
customer_reviews.text: XL scooter cover fit my 2014 Aprilia shiver 750 perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Doug White

customer_reviews.title: Amazon, Amazon, Amazon  .........
customer_reviews.text: Used to Cover a 2019 Yamaha Scooter, works very well staying put,and keeping the Scooter Dry, Thanks Guys
customer_reviews.author: Garry N. Sandlin

customer_reviews.title: Ripped Within A Week
customer_reviews.text: Very nice that it can be clipped on both the front and back. Unfortunately after a week on the bike, my fender wore through the material and has a large hole in it out. Not durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: rips very easy
customer_reviews.text: the product was great until about a week in it got a little windy and the clips holding it down ripped off and the cover blew away leaving me with just the ripped off clips would not recommend if you still want a cover after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Maimi

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality, perfect size for my 150cc Scooter with trunk.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rummell

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. In few days it started to tear up.
customer_reviews.author: Elton L Johann

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised, nice fit and keeps the dirt off.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit scooter very well and keeps scooter dry shipping was fast as well
customer_reviews.author: Chris Macleod

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover. Fit great
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover. Fit great. Keeps water. A little bit tight for an r6 with stunt cage. Also have 2 zips to tight. Definitely recommend. Probably will buy second one.
customer_reviews.author: Jurijs N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Ducati Monster 821
customer_reviews.text: I like it, fits perfect on a Ducati Monster 821.
customer_reviews.author: ViennaDisco

customer_reviews.title: Great for a bike cover for a trike or a big bike
customer_reviews.text: Great as a bike cover, for a trike or a big bike
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: The item have an very easy way to connect to the other side , and very easy to fold back to very small size
customer_reviews.text: The product is very easy to cover with and apply full protection from any weather but he is thin so i am little worried that he will get cut very easy , outherwise it's great item especially for it's price.
customer_reviews.author: shon shushan

customer_reviews.title: Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and kept my new CRF 250L Dry from the morning dew!
customer_reviews.author: Lone Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Kind of thin. But you get what you pay ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of thin. But you get what you pay for. Fit well on my scooter well though.
customer_reviews.author: LRC to Go.

customer_reviews.title: Meh- Super thin but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Meh- Super thin but you get what you pay for. Probably best for indoor storage dust cover. I’ll probably be buying a new cover soon as my bike is stored outside.
customer_reviews.author: Skott Zviman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits perfect top to bottom around my honda rebel ..looks great as well ...very dusty in my garage at times .cover just touches the floor keeps my bike dust free
customer_reviews.author: Truckdriver1972

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a little big, but covers well & keeps my vintage scooter dry.
customer_reviews.author: Rfab

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my application and very well made for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a dust cover for my Burgman 400 scooter. Perfect for my application and very well made for the low price.
customer_reviews.author: steve t

customer_reviews.title: I hope to receive a free replacement
customer_reviews.text: I order already two in the last six months they just don’t last as they supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Eyal benson

customer_reviews.title: It looks good but wasnt nearly as thick ofmaterial as i expected ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks good but wasnt nearly as thick ofmaterial as i expected based on photos. I would have selected something smaller that better fits my moped.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: There perfect fits right in my saddle bag doesn't take up much room,very lite and keeps the wet & dust off my bike
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Herbein

customer_reviews.title: EVERY  Thing that glitters ain’t GOLD
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a few water droplets, but besides that I was in love at first sight, it’s used for my 2019 Honda PCX, Hundreds of holed in this thing, Not waterproof
customer_reviews.author: James Robertson

customer_reviews.title: It lasted about 3 mo. before the first hole ...
customer_reviews.text: It lasted about 3 mo. before the first hole showed up the color faded got this in April and Nov. is here and this one is already in the trash but i guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Ramone

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Was not a snug fit at all, very thin and also didn’t keep the bike dry at all. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cody Connors

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, my scooter is wet after rain like it wasn't covered
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good protection and light weight, good to store inside the motorcycle when not in use. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: big mistake and would not recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: This a cheap piece of nylon with no vents and no protection for hot pipes; big mistake and would not recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's great to have.
customer_reviews.text: I like it it keeps my motorcycle safe from weather
customer_reviews.author: Mary  Routt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and good quality item. Like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ha T.

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertising to be waterproof, but it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Coble

customer_reviews.title: For the $$$$ - Deal !
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Gift. The giftee said it was perfect for her bike Happy Owner.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: but works just fine!
customer_reviews.text: This is a little big for my scooter, but works just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Weffie007

customer_reviews.title: scooter cover
customer_reviews.text: This by far is the best cover for the price I ever bought. rings on bottom for front tire lock.also bottom of cover has straps. Thick and solid good protection from rain and hot sun..
customer_reviews.author: jaws II

product_meta.title: Tokept Black and Red Motercycle Cover Waterproof Sun UV Dustproof XL 96" for All Scooter and Mopeds-Yamaha Honda Suzuki Kavasaki Ducati BMW
product_meta.description:
Fully protects your motorcycle from rain, snow, and more. Designed specifically for everyday indoor and outdoor use in all types of weather.

Keeps motorcycle paint from fading or flaking . 

FITS MOST LARGE MOTORCYCLES & MEDIUM CRUISERS like Harley Heritage and Fatboy, Suzuki Boulevard C50, BMW K 1200 LT, Honda Goldwing, Honda VTX 1800, Harley Electra Glide, Harley Road Glide, Harley Road King, Kawasaki Vulcan 900 LT, and many more.

100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE ensures you are getting the very highest quality motorcycle cover available for this price.
feature_bullets: Size:X-Large,Ideal for outdoor use in all climates
Condition: Brand New; Fits 96'' Harley Davison Victory Suzuki Yamaha Honda etc
Material:Durable black 190T oxford fabric and special waterproof layer provides maximum protection against rain and fading
Package Content: 1 x Motorcycle Cover, 1 x Carry bag
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: no reason for return or change.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars200 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
